T02D3061:116b-1: a'arya aa tsa la kro dha r'a dza sto tra bod skad du /
T02D3061:116b-2: khro bo'i rgyal po 'phags pa mi g-yo ba la bstod pa /
T02D3061:116b-3: bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3061:116b-4: thugs rje'i bdag nyid khro rgyal brtan pa'i sku //
T02D3061:116b-5: brkyang bskum thabs las byung ba'i khro rgyal dang //
T02D3061:116b-6: bcas te nam mkha'i 'od kyi dkyil na bzhugs //
T02D3061:117a-1: dang nor bu dang chu skyes 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3061:117a-2: shar sgo'i g-yas logs su chos dbyings rdo rje ma
T02D3061:117a-3: rdo rje sems dpa' lta bu chos 'byung dkar po
T02D3061:117a-4: dang ral gri dang nor bu dang chu skyes 'dzin
T02D3061:117a-5: pa'o // 'jam pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i lha
T02D3061:117a-6: 'di rnams ni zhal gsum phyag drug pa phyag mtshan
T02D3061:117a-7: dang po gnyis g-yas pa dag gis dang gzhan pa
T02D3061:117a-8: gnyis g-yon pa dag gis 'dzin pa ste thams cad
T02D3061:117a-9: kyi rtsa ba'i zhal ni sku mdog bzhin no //
T02D3061:117a-10: shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su gshin rje mthar
T02D3061:117a-11: byed dang shes rab mthar byed dang padma mthar byed
T02D3061:117a-12: dang bdud rtsi 'khyil pa rnams so //
T02D3061:117a-13: 'dir 'jam pa'i rdo rje dang rnam par snang mdzad
T02D3061:117a-14: dang lha mo bcu drug po rnams ni zla ba'i
T02D3061:117a-15: dkyil 'khor la rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa
T02D3061:117a-16: ste / gzhan rnams ni nyi ma la'o //
T02D3061:117a-17: zla ba dang nyi ma rnams kyi 'og tu sna tshogs 'dam skyes so //
T02D3061:117a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rtsa ba'i phyag dag
T02D3061:117a-19: gis rang 'od kyi shes rab la 'khyud pa ste
T02D3061:117a-20: lha mo rnams kyang rang 'od kyi thabs la'o //
T02D3061:117a-21: dbu la rigs kyi bdag po ste 'jam pa'i rdo
T02D3061:117a-22: rje la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang
T02D3061:117a-23: m'a ma k'i dang sgra rdo rje ma dang srung
T02D3061:117a-24: ba'i 'khor lo la gnas pa'i khro bo brgyad la
T02D3061:117a-25: mi bskyod pa'o // sbyan ma dang gzugs rdo rje
T02D3061:117a-26: ma dang gshin rje mthar byed rnams la rnam par
T02D3061:117a-27: mi bskyod pa'o // snang mdzad de / dri rdo rje ma la ni rin chen dbang po'o //
T02D3061:117a-28: gos dkar mo dang rdo rje ma dang padma mthar
T02D3061:117a-29: byed rnams la 'od dpag med de sgrol ma dang
T02D3061:117a-30: reg bya rdo rje ma la ni don yod grub
T02D3061:117a-31: pa'o // chos dbyings rdo rje ma la rdo rje
T02D3061:117a-32: 'dzin pa ste gzhan rnams la ni mi bskyod pa'o
T02D3061:117a-33: pa'o // // 'dir rdo rje sems dpa' ni sku
T02D3061:117a-34: mdog dkar po la cung zad dmar ba'i mdangs dang
T02D3061:117a-35: ldan pa g-yas pa dang cig shos kyi zhal ni
T02D3061:117a-37: rtsa ba'i phyag dag gis rang 'od kyi shes rab la 'khyud pa /
T02D3061:117a-38: rdo rje sngon po dang ral gri dang nor bu
T02D3061:117a-39: dang padma 'dzin pa sna tshogs padma dang zla ba'i
T02D3061:117a-40: gdan la rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa zla
T02D3061:117a-41: ba'i 'od can rin po che'i cod pan dang rin
T02D3061:117a-42: po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa mi bskyod pas rgyas
T02D3061:117a-43: btab pa'o // 'dir 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i thugs kar
T02D3061:117a-44: dam tshig sems dpa' lta bu'i ye shes sems dpa'
T02D3061:117b-0: ste de'i thugs @117b ka'i zla bar ral gri'i yu
T02D3061:117b-1: bar gnas pa'i zla ba la sa bon mam mo
T02D3061:117b-2: btab pa'o // // rtag pa dang rin chen dbang
T02D3061:117b-3: po dang 'od dpag med dang don yod grub pa
T02D3061:117b-4: dang mi bskyod pa rnams kyi thugs kar phyag mtshan
T02D3061:117b-5: la ji lta rigs par zla bar nyi ma la
T02D3061:117b-6: bhr'um a'am dzr'im kham h'um ngo //
T02D3061:117b-7: spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams la l'am
T02D3061:117b-8: m'am p'am t'am dza: h'um bam ho: kham ram mo
T02D3061:117b-9: // khro bo rnams la ni h'um ngo zhes pa
T02D3061:117b-10: sa bon te 'khor lo'i dbang po la sogs pa'i
T02D3061:117b-11: thugs kar sngags rnams dgod par bya'o //
T02D3061:117b-12: aom a'a: mam h'um 'khor lo'i dbang po mi bskyod pa dang lhan cig dbyer med pa'i'o //
T02D3061:117b-13: aom a'a: dzi na dzi ka h'um rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o //
T02D3061:117b-14: aom a'a: ratna dhri ka h'um rin chen 'byung ldan gyi'o //
T02D3061:117b-15: aom a'a: a'a ro li ka h'um 'od dpag med kyi'o //
T02D3061:117b-16: aom a'a: pradzny'a dhri ka h'um don yod grub pa'i'o //
T02D3061:117b-17: aom a'a: mo ha ra ti h'um spyan ma'i'o //
T02D3061:117b-18: aom a'a: dve sha ra ti h'um m'a ma k'i'i'o //
T02D3061:117b-19: aom a'a: r'a ga ra ti h'um gos dkar mo'i'o //
T02D3061:117b-20: aom a'a: badzra ra ti h'um sgrol ma'i'o //
T02D3061:117b-21: aom a'a: r'u pa badzri dza: h'um gzugs rdo rje ma'o //
T02D3061:117b-22: aom a'a: shapta badzre h'um h'um sgra rdo rje ma'i'o //
T02D3061:117b-23: aom a'a: gandhe badzre bam h'um dri rdo rje ma'i'o //
T02D3061:117b-24: aom a'a: ra sa badzre ho: h'um ro rdo rje ma'i'o //
T02D3061:117b-25: aom a'a: sparshe badzre kham h'um reg bya rdo rje ma'i'o //
T02D3061:117b-26: aom a'a: dharma dh'a tu badzre ram h'um chos dbyings rdo rje ma'i'o //
T02D3061:117b-27: aom a'a: ya m'anta kri ta h'um gshin rje mthar byed kyi'o //
T02D3061:117b-28: aom a'a: pradzny'anta kri ta h'um shes rab mthar byed kyi'o //
T02D3061:117b-29: aom a'a: padm'anta kri ta h'um padma mthar byed kyi'o //
T02D3061:117b-30: aom a'a: bighn'anta kri ta h'um phat bgegs mthar byed kyi'o //
T02D3061:117b-31: gang gi tshe 'jam pa'i rdo rje dang dbyer med
T02D3061:117b-32: pa'i mi bskyod pa 'khor lo'i dbang por gyur pa
T02D3061:117b-33: de'i tshe aom a'a: badzra dhri ka h'um /
T02D3061:117b-35: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor la mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D3061:117b-36: ye shes sems dpa' bzhugs pa la sogs pa ni ma bshad do //
T02D3061:117b-37: de'i rjes la mig gi mngon par shes pa la
T02D3061:117b-38: sogs pa yon tan gyi tshogs dpag tu med cing
T02D3061:117b-39: bsam gyis mi khyab pas mdzes par byas pa'i yi
T02D3061:117b-40: dam gyi lha'i sku legs par yongs su dag cing
T02D3061:117b-41: rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa la rgyun
T02D3061:117b-42: mi 'chad par yang dang yang du lhag par mos
